item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 4, 2024 at 2:50 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Robert Dennard, DRAM Pioneer, has died (155 points | 14 comments)
2. Were RNNs all we needed? (277 points | 128 comments)
3. Canvas is a new way to write and code with ChatGPT (624 points | 456 comments)
4. Tengine: Open-source web server, originated by Taobao, based on Nginx (56 points | 21 comments)
5. Dance training superior to physical exercise in inducing brain plasticity (2018) (231 points | 126 comments)
6. Cox slows Internet speeds in entire neighborhoods to punish any heavy users (148 points | 103 comments)
7. Patent troll Sable pays up, dedicates all its patents to the public (814 points | 270 comments)
8. The Heart of Unix (2018) (89 points | 31 comments)
9. Serving 70B-scale LLMs efficiently on low-resource edge devices [pdf] (211 points | 54 comments)
10. Image Editing with Gaussian Splatting (215 points | 57 comments)
11. The Unraveling of Space-Time (4 points | discuss)
12. Update on Reflection-70B (66 points | 36 comments)
13. MikroPhone: A privacy enhanced, simple and featured RISC-V mobile phone (100 points | 26 comments)
14. DOSBox-X: Enhanced Fork of DOSBox for Expanded DOS and Retro PC Support (54 points | 14 comments)
15. Skymont: Intel’s E-Cores reach for the Sky (25 points | 4 comments)
16. Solving methane mysteries with satellite imagery (113 points | 19 comments)
17. Mux (YC W16) is hiring a video engineer ( | hide)
18. We’re migrating many of our servers from Linux to the BSDs (81 points | 17 comments)
19. HTTrack Website Copier (62 points | 13 comments)
20. Personal Names Around the World (2011) (4 points | 1 comment)
21. UK will give sovereignty of Chagos Islands to Mauritius (136 points | 146 comments)
22. Show HN: Zero – DX focused non framework to interact with the DOM (8 points | discuss)
23. Improving Accessibility Using Vision Models (33 points | 10 comments)
24. Please Don't Make Me Download Another App (8 points | discuss)
25. US Dept of Energy announces $1.5B in electric grid improvements (121 points | 76 comments)
26. Biblical plant with medicinal properties resurrected from 1,000-year-old seed (50 points | 12 comments)
27. Biggest solar flare since 2017 erupts from sun and Earth is in the firing line (87 points | 34 comments)
28. FLUX1.1 [pro] – New SotA text-to-image model from Black Forest Labs (179 points | 122 comments)
29. Show HN: Screensavers for your terminal (Bevy/Ratatui) (16 points | 3 comments)
30. Show HN: I made a super-simple image CDN (29 points | 20 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 4, 2024 at 2:50 AM UTC
